wikipedia_page.main: Malcolm Alker (born 4 November 1978) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played as a hooker. He spent his entire professional career with the Salford City Reds, making over 350 appearances between 1997 and 2010. He also served as the club's captain for many years.

response: He was signed by the Warrington Wolves for 2006's Super League XI, released from his contract at the end of the 2008 season. After joining Salford City Reds he was announced as their new club captain on 10 February after long-serving captain Malcolm Alker was stripped of the captaincy during pre-season.
* Hit Man: Malcolm Alker (Salford City Reds), 981 tackles
